name: Return of Olympus: Beginner's Luck
description:
Return of Olympus: Beginner's Luck is a visual novel created for NaNoRenO 2017 about two magical girls, Leah and Kelsey, who are both pretty new to the whole magical girl thing, and trying to figure out the basics of fighting monsters and working together.

Features:

  • Some lovely art by Shinoki Wen and Silversporksama!
  • A short, sweet story that examines an average (monster-filled) day in the lives of its characters!
  • Wonderful voice acting!
  • Anime jokes!
  • And much more!
To Install:
As far as we know, there are only two things you need to do to run Beginner's Luck: unzip the file, then install the fonts DIOGENES.ttf and eurosti.ttf located inside (in ReturnofOlympusBL-1.0-all\game\gui). That's it! Then you can run it from the .exe.
